duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparation of individual and business tax returns
Analyzing financial information and preparing financial reports
Installing, modifying, and coordinating implementation of accounting systems and accounting control procedures
Advising management regarding effects of business activities on taxes and on strategies for minimizing tax liability
Collecting appropriate data and preparing federal, state, and local reports and tax returns
Ensuring company compliance with periodic tax payment and information reporting
Maintaining tax records and conducting tax studies and special projects

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting; Certified Public Accountant (CPA), Enrolled Agent (EA) or Certified Public Accountant Candidate with public accounting experience
